meanings.sent1: In some cultures, idolism involves praying to statues.
meanings.sent2: Her idolism led her to visit the temple every day.
meanings.sent3: The idolism of the ancient tribe was based on wooden carvings.
meanings.sent4: His idolism for the rock star was like a beacon in his life.
meanings.sent5: The idolism of the villagers was evident in the elaborate ceremonies they held.

meanings.definition: Excessive admiration or devotion to someone or something.
meanings.sent1: Her idolism towards the famous actress was unwavering.
meanings.sent2: His idolism for his favorite sports team knew no bounds.
meanings.sent3: The idolism of the cat towards its owner was adorable.
meanings.sent4: The idolism of the fans towards the singer was like a tidal wave of love.
meanings.sent5: Their idolism for the new gadget was palpable in their excitement.
